content.title: Earn 15% with Kickbooster!
content.creator:
DEZZIOCollaborator
February 25, 2025
content.content:
Hi Backers,

In less than a week, we're already 430%+ funded with more than 370+ backers!  ðŸ˜±

We've got some fun updates to share with you all:
What we've accomplished: 
1) ðŸ¥³ 430%+ in funding with $40,000+ with more than 370+ backers!
2) ðŸš€ Kickstarter chose us for their "Projects We Love" award!
3) ðŸ’¸ We have partnered with our manufacturer's and working on pre-production process.
The Kickstarter team selects a few projects that they believe stand out in terms of innovation, uniqueness, and creativity, and MagMirror made the cut! This means we will also get a ton more exposure all across Kickstarter, which will only boost our success. 
MagMirror x KICKBOOSTER
We are excited to share that we have partnered with Kickbooster affiliate marketing platform which enables all you wonderful backers to become our brand ambassadors. Yes, you heard it right!
To become our brand ambassador you will have to talk about the MagMirror everywhere (on LinkedIn, Facebook, email etc etc). The more you share the more chances for you to earn 15% for every successful pledge you refer. That's more like $16 for every MagMirror help pre-order.
Simply follow the steps below to earn commissions:
1. Click here to become a booster.
2. Share your unique link with your friends and family.
3. Check your Kickbooster dashboard for your commission!
Best,
Ankit

comments.text: Unless you sent us the product, how can we honestly boost it?
